content: **crocheted hearts in drops safran theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern e-325 yarn group a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** piece measures approx width = 4½ cm height = 4 cm **materials** drops safran from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 50 g colour 20 cherry 50 g colour 19 red 50 g colour 66 mustard 50 colour 67 pumpkin 50 g colour 13 raspberry 50 g colour 65 pistachio 50 g colour 60 moss green 50 g colour 22 light brown 1 heart weighs approx 2 g crochet hook drops crochet hook size 3 mm **crochet gauge ** 24 treble crochets in width and 13 row vertically = 10 x 10 cm note remember that hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook
